summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Czech cultural booking system. Backend APIs working excellently (94.1% success rate). Frontend displays Czech content correctly but has critical UI interaction issues preventing full registration flow completion.

minor_issues.issue: Required institution_id field in request body
minor_issues.resolution: Created separate ThemeUpdate model without institution_id requirement

ui_bugs.issue: Submit button not clickable due to overlay interception
ui_bugs.details: HTML element intercepts pointer events preventing form submission
ShadCN select component timing issues in registration form

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete registration due to form submission overlay issue

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Czech content correctly
Registration form displays and fields can be filled
Login form displays and accepts input
All backend APIs (registration, login, programs, bookings, theme, payments)
Stripe payment integration creates sessions successfully
CRUD operations for programs and bookings
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix registration form overlay issue preventing button clicks. The submit button is blocked by <html> element intercepting pointer events. Also investigate ShadCN Select component timing issues in modals. These issues completely block user registration flow.
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py (added ThemeUpdate model and fixed theme endpoint)

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (major functionality works but critical registration flow blocked)
